name: Warm-up for the party
description: Light, funny questions to get the party warmed up without any unwelcome surprises — perfect for kicking things off!

dares.title: Dancing Broccoli
dares.action: ${c_player}, pretend you're a piece of broccoli that went clubbing. Dance until ${r_player} says "boiled!"

dares.title: Martian Taxi Dispatcher
dares.action: ${c_player}, you are the dispatcher of the Mars taxi service. Explain to ${r_player} how to get to planet Zyuz.

dares.title: Very Important Chicken
dares.action: ${c_player}, as a high-ranking chicken, address the nation. Cluck ${rand(3,5)} times.

dares.title: Fridge Secret Agent
dares.action: ${c_player}, play an agent trying to find out from ${r_player} what's in their fridge.

dares.title: Lunar Radio Host
dares.action: ${c_player}, host a news broadcast from the Moon. Talk about weather, sports and sensations — everything must be lunar.

dares.title: Philosopher Grandma
dares.action: ${c_player}, become a grumbling grandma and explain to ${r_player} why the youth no longer values the letter "${r_letter}".

dares.title: Talking Sofa
dares.action: ${c_player}, act as the sofa that ${r_player} just sat on. Complain about the hard life of furniture.

dares.title: Chaos Fairy
dares.action: ${c_player}, you're a fairy who grants weird wishes. Offer ${r_player} ${rand(2,3)} absurd gifts.

dares.title: Cat at a Job Interview
dares.action: ${c_player}, imagine you're a cat applying for a job. ${r_player} is the interviewer.

dares.title: Teacher of Absurdity
dares.action: ${c_player}, give a lesson on "How to dance on the ceiling." Use at least ${rand(3,5)} technical terms.

dares.title: TikTok Star
dares.action: ${c_player}, act out a parody of a viral video. ${r_player} must guess what it is.

dares.title: Dragon Dentist
dares.action: ${c_player}, you're a dragon moonlighting as a dentist. Give ${r_player} a check-up.

dares.title: Emotion Mailman
dares.action: ${c_player}, you deliver letters only in the form of emotions. Deliver news to ${r_player} using only facial expressions.

dares.title: Laugh Mechanic
dares.action: ${c_player}, show how you "repair" ${r_player}'s laughter. Describe your tools and methods.

dares.title: Detective of Lost Slippers
dares.action: ${c_player}, find clues to accuse ${r_player} of stealing imaginary slippers.

dares.title: Owl Consultant
dares.action: ${c_player}, give wise but completely useless advice to ${r_player} using only words starting with "${r_letter}".

dares.title: Group Commercial
dares.action: All players together make an ad for the new product: "Hat for Sadness". ${r_player} directs the shoot.

dares.title: Cartoon Chef
dares.action: ${c_player}, invent and present the dish "Omelet of Thunder and Rainbow." Be convincing!

dares.title: Everyone Is a Mime
dares.action: For ${rand(15,30)} seconds all players may communicate only with gestures. Whoever speaks drinks.

dares.title: Wild Animal
dares.action: Each player shows how they would behave if they were a pet ostrich. ${c_player} is the judge.

dares.title: Secret Vegetable
dares.action: ${c_player}, if you were a vegetable, which one and why? ${r_player} may disagree and suggest an alternative.

dares.title: Fine for Thinking
dares.action: ${c_player}, if every thought cost a fine, what thought would already owe you a million?

dares.title: Face of the Week
dares.action: ${c_player}, whose face would you replace yours with for a week? ${r_player} must approve the choice.

dares.title: Body Swap
dares.action: ${c_player}, which player would you definitely NOT swap bodies with and why?

dares.title: Mind Sandwich
dares.action: ${c_player}, build a sandwich out of players' personalities: who is the bread, cheese, sauce, and why.

dares.title: Meme Soul
dares.action: ${c_player}, which meme best describes your personality? ${r_player} may disagree.

dares.title: Dance of the Soul
dares.action: ${c_player}, if your soul could be expressed by a dance — what dance would it be?

dares.title: Penguin President
dares.action: ${c_player}, how would the country change if it were led by a penguin with ${r_player}'s voice?

dares.title: Absurd Holiday
dares.action: ${c_player}, invent a ridiculous holiday you'd like to make official.

dares.title: Pointless Choice
dares.action: ${c_player}, choose: lose your nose forever or speak forever with ${r_player}'s voice?

dares.title: Shared Fail
dares.action: Each player tells something they did and immediately regretted. ${r_player} picks the winner.

dares.title: Collective Fantasy
dares.action: Players take turns continuing the phrase: "If I were a banana..." Whoever messes up drinks.

dares.title: Nonsensical Law
dares.action: ${c_player}, create a new absurd law that will apply in this room.

dares.title: Official Color of the Day
dares.action: ${c_player}, choose the "color of the day" and explain why everyone must obey it.

dares.title: Spirit Animal
dares.action: ${c_player}, choose an animal that spiritually patronizes ${r_player} and explain why.

dares.title: Dreamworld Job
dares.action: ${c_player}, what would your job be if all professions were based on dreams?

dares.title: Group Verdict
dares.action: Everyone decides what role ${c_player} would have in a post-apocalypse. ${c_player} may object — but risks drinking.

dares.title: Living Name
dares.action: ${c_player}, if your name reflected your nature, what would it be? (${r_letter} must be included!)

dares.title: Group Reboot
dares.action: Everyone simultaneously says one word, creating a sentence. Repeats forbidden. Make a mistake — drink.

dares.title: One Day as Someone Else
dares.action: ${c_player}, choose any player. Describe how you'd spend one day in their body.

dares.title: Object Life
dares.action: ${c_player}, if you could become a household object, what would it be and why?

dares.title: Unusual Pet
dares.action: ${c_player}, what's the strangest animal you'd like to have and why?

dares.title: Time Travel
dares.action: ${c_player}, which historical period would you visit and why?

dares.title: Superpower
dares.action: ${c_player}, which superpower would you choose if you could?

dares.title: Celebrity for a Day
dares.action: ${c_player}, which celebrity would you like to be for one day and what would you do?

dares.title: Cartoon Life
dares.action: ${c_player}, which cartoon character would you like to become and why?

dares.title: Invisible Day
dares.action: ${c_player}, what's the first thing you'd do if you were invisible for one day?

dares.title: Best Holiday
dares.action: ${c_player}, if you could create a new holiday, what would it be?

dares.title: Three Wishes
dares.action: ${c_player}, imagine you caught a goldfish. What three wishes would you make?

dares.title: Desert Island
dares.action: ${c_player}, what three items would you take to a deserted island?

dares.title: Hidden Talents
dares.action: Each player shares a hidden talent. Whoever refuses drinks.

dares.title: Strange Food
dares.action: Players take turns naming the weirdest thing they've ever eaten. If you can't recall, drink.

dares.title: Unusual Profession
dares.action: ${c_player}, what's the most unusual profession you can imagine and would like to try?

dares.title: Animal Life
dares.action: ${c_player}, which animal would you like to be for a day and why?

dares.title: Weird Sport
dares.action: ${c_player}, invent the most ridiculous sport you can.

dares.title: Childhood Dream
dares.action: ${c_player}, what did you dream of becoming as a child and why didn't it happen?

dares.title: Group Trip
dares.action: All players propose one place for a group trip. ${r_player} chooses the funniest location.

dares.title: Dream House
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe your ideal house. How is it different from an ordinary one?

dares.title: Pointless Purchase
dares.action: Each player names the most useless thing they've bought. Refuse — drink.

dares.title: One Day as President
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe how you'd spend the day as the country's president.

dares.title: Statue of Liberty
dares.action: ${c_player}, freeze in the Statue of Liberty pose and hold for ${rand(15,25)} seconds.

dares.title: Unwilling Dancer
dares.action: ${c_player}, perform a short funny dance invented by ${r_player}.

dares.title: Penguin Walk
dares.action: ${c_player}, waddle around the room like a penguin for ${rand(2,4)} laps.

dares.title: Balancing Act
dares.action: ${c_player}, try to balance any object on your head for ${rand(10,20)} seconds.

dares.title: Running in Place
dares.action: ${c_player}, act like you're running away from a swarm of bees for ${rand(15,20)} seconds.

dares.title: Finger Gymnastics
dares.action: ${r_player}, show a funny finger exercise that everyone must copy.

dares.title: Air Guitar
dares.action: ${c_player}, play an invisible guitar to a song hummed by ${r_player}.

dares.title: Invisible Jump Rope
dares.action: ${c_player}, jump an invisible rope ${rand(10,15)} times.

dares.title: Yoga Style
dares.action: ${c_player}, strike a difficult and silly yoga pose named by ${r_player}.

dares.title: Robot Dance
dares.action: ${c_player}, dance like a robot in a club.

dares.title: Space Walk
dares.action: All players imitate walking in zero gravity for ${rand(10,20)} seconds.

dares.title: Airplane Pose
dares.action: ${c_player}, pose like an airplane balancing on one leg for ${rand(10,15)} seconds.

dares.title: Fight with Invisible
dares.action: ${c_player}, act out a short fight scene with an invisible opponent.

dares.title: Fun Warm-up
dares.action: ${r_player}, lead a short and funny warm-up for all players.

dares.title: Moon Walk
dares.action: ${c_player}, slowly walk across the room as if stepping on the Moon.

dares.title: Singing Balance
dares.action: ${c_player}, sing a short song standing on one leg.

dares.title: Shadow Boxing
dares.action: ${c_player}, perform a quick match with an imaginary rival.

dares.title: Team Airplane
dares.action: All players line up as an airplane and circle the room led by ${r_player}.

dares.title: Invisible Volleyball
dares.action: ${c_player}, play a short match of invisible volleyball against ${r_player}.

dares.title: Dancing Animals
dares.action: ${c_player}, dance like an animal chosen by ${r_player}.

dares.title: Air Salesperson
dares.action: ${c_player}, convincingly sell air to the other players for ${rand(10,20)} seconds.

dares.title: News About Nothing
dares.action: ${c_player}, deliver breaking news about a completely unimportant event.

dares.title: Unusual Tour
dares.action: ${c_player}, give a brief tour of the room as if it's a museum.

dares.title: Boredom Ad
dares.action: ${c_player}, create an advertising slogan for boredom so people will want to buy it.

dares.title: Sports Commentator
dares.action: ${c_player}, comment on any actions of ${r_player} as if they were a sports match.

dares.title: Movie in 15 Seconds
dares.action: ${c_player}, summarize any famous movie in 15 seconds. Others guess.

dares.title: Impromptu Poem
dares.action: ${c_player}, compose a short four-line poem about ${r_player}.

dares.title: Absurd Interview
dares.action: ${c_player}, interview ${r_player} as if they are a renowned expert on laziness.

dares.title: Group Fairy Tale
dares.action: Players take turns saying one sentence, creating a ridiculous fairy tale. Slip up — drink.

dares.title: Lecture About Nothing
dares.action: ${c_player}, give a scientific lecture on "why doing nothing is beneficial".

dares.title: One-Man Show
dares.action: ${c_player}, stage a mini-play, playing all characters yourself.

dares.title: Team Commercial
dares.action: All players together invent a commercial for an imaginary product.

dares.title: Inventor of Absurdity
dares.action: ${c_player}, invent and present a ridiculous invention that improves people's lives.

dares.title: Horoscope by ${c_player}
dares.action: ${c_player}, predict ${r_player}'s day as if you are a professional astrologer.

dares.title: Weather Reporter
dares.action: ${c_player}, give tomorrow's weather forecast for this room.

dares.title: Group Rap
dares.action: Players take turns composing a short rap about the current game.

dares.title: Convincing Lie
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell a brief life story. Others guess if it's true or false.

dares.title: Weirdness Expert
dares.action: ${c_player}, explain the usefulness of a completely useless item suggested by ${r_player}.

dares.title: Group Orchestra
dares.action: All players act as an orchestra using only hands and voices. ${r_player} conducts.

dares.title: Human Manual
dares.action: ${c_player}, give instructions on how to operate a human as if it's a household appliance.
